extract_gene_ids2name module¶

extract_gene_ids2name.create_dict(path)[source]¶

Save unique gene ids and names to dict

Parameters

path – to gtf file

Returns

gene_dict mapping gene_ids to gene_names

extract_gene_ids2name.lines(genes)[source]¶

Generator for lines in gtf file

Parameters

genes – .gtf file

extract_gene_ids2name.parse(line)[source]¶

Parse ;-sep line of gtf file

Parameters

line – of gtf file

Returns

gene_dict

extract_gene_ids2name.write_genes(path, outfile)[source]¶

Write genes2names into table

Parameters

  • path – to genes.gtf

  • outfile – path to output file .txt
